messages.subject: The accound of Sandra in Saskatoon
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 3/5/03 9:16:19 PM Central Standard Time, AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 3/5/03 9:16:19 PM Central Standard Time,
AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com writes:

<< People in Saskatchewan were very friendly. I had a way better time than I
thought i would have. I was afraid I'd be all alone surrounded by
strangers,
but it never felt that way from the moment I saw Ian and Barbie at the
airport. >>

It all sounds wonderful.
Thanks for filling us in. I know there are going to be lovely memories of
the SC conference this year too, I just KNOW it!

Ren
"The sun is shining--the sun is shining. That is the magic. The flowers are
growing--the roots are stirring. That is the magic. Being alive is the
magic--being strong is the magic The magic is in me--the magic is in
me....It's in every one of us."

----Frances Hodgson Burnett
